whyChooseUs.title: Free Education
whyChooseUs.description: At GyanaGuru, we believe that education should be accessible to everyone, regardless of their financial background.

whyChooseUs.title: Wide Range of Courses
whyChooseUs.description: We offer a diverse range of courses across a variety of disciplines, from programming and data science to marketing and design.

whyChooseUs.title: Interactive Learning Experience
whyChooseUs.description: Our courses are designed to be engaging and interactive, with a focus on hands-on learning and practical applications.
